title: New
subtitle: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.
about: I'm a Front-End Web Developer, oriented to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Passionate about translating UI/UX design wireframes to actual code and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation using web markup languages like HTML5 and CSS3, server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS, client-side scripting and JavaScript (ES6) libraries, like React

title: Newww
subtitle: Every developer has their own preference dev tools and frameworks to work with
about: I'm a React fan. Also vanilla Javascript and Sass are my second language. I cannot live without my iTerm2 (or any kind of terminal) and my beautiful theme in VSCode. Mac or Linux are my preference, I broke up with Windows a long time ago!

title: Mentoring
subtitle: As a life coaching entusiast and coding lover, I genuinely care about people, and love helping fellow developer work on their art and tch.
about: If you are a self learner, or you feel you need more guidance in the Frontend world, we can plan together a path where you can clarify all your doubts in the process of learning. A personalized assistance will help you to grow faster and also have someone to share your knowledge and build a community!
